_header: The bread that feedeth us every day
_description: A prayer for Easter, in a Latin sermon Panem nostrum cotidianum da nobis hodie — one couplet

CULIi38.Transcription:
þe bred þat fedoȝ vs eueri dayþou graunte vs lord
                    þis esterday
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 8.
